ayas.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

ayas.arabic: حمٓ
ayas.translation: Ha. Mim.
ayas.transliteration: ḥā mīm

ayas.arabic: عٓسٓقٓ
ayas.translation: A'in. Sin. Qaf.
ayas.transliteration: 'ain sīn qāf

ayas.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُوحِىٓ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
ayas.translation: Thus Allah the Mighty, the Knower inspireth thee (Muhammad) as (He inspired) those before thee.
ayas.transliteration: kadhālika yūḥī ilayka wa ilal ladhīna min qablikallāhul `azīzul ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
ayas.translation: Unto Him belongeth all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth, and He is the Sublime, the Tremendous.
ayas.transliteration: lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۖ wahuwal `aliyyul `aẓīm

ayas.arabic: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرْنَ مِن فَوْقِهِنَّ ۚ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَ لِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
ayas.translation: Almost might the heavens above be rent asunder while the angels hymn the praise of their Lord and ask forgiveness for those on the earth. Lo! Allah, He is the Forgiver, the Merciful.
ayas.transliteration: takādus samāwātu yatafaṭṭarna min fawqihinn ۚ wal malā-ikatu yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim wayastaghfirūna liman fil-arḍ ۗ alā innallāha huwal ghafūrur raḥīm

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهُ حَفِيظٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍ
ayas.translation: And as for those who choose protecting friends beside Him, Allah is Warden over them, and thou art in no wise a guardian over them.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīnat-takhadhū min dūnihi awliyā-allāhu ḥafīẓun `alayhim wa mā anta `alayhim biwakīl

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا لِّتُنذِرَ أُمَّ ٱلْقُرَىٰ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَتُنذِرَ يَوْمَ ٱلْجَمْعِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ ۚ فَرِيقٌ فِى ٱلْجَنَّةِ وَفَرِيقٌ فِى ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayas.translation: And thus We have inspired in thee a Lecture in Arabic, that thou mayst warn the mother-town and those around it, and mayst warn of a day of assembling whereof there is no doubt. A host will be in the Garden, and a host of them in the Flame.
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika awḥaynā ilayka qur-ānan `arabiyyal litundhira ummal qurā wa man ḥawlahā watundhira yawmal jam`i lā rayba fīh ۚ farīqun fil jannati wafarīqun fis sa`īr

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَجَعَلَهُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَلَـٰكِن يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ مَا لَهُم مِّن وَلِىٍّ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
ayas.translation: Had Allah willed, He could have made them one community, but Allah bringeth whom He will into His mercy. And the wrong-doers have no friend nor helper.
ayas.transliteration: walaw shā-allāhu laja`alahum ummatan wāḥidatan walākin yudkhilu man yashā-u fī raḥmatih ۚ waẓ ẓālimūna mā lahum min waliyyin walā naṣīr

ayas.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۖ فَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلْوَلِىُّ وَهُوَ يُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Or have they chosen protecting friends besides Him? But Allah, He (alone) is the Protecting Friend. He quickeneth the dead, and He is Able to do all things.
ayas.transliteration: amit-takhadhū min dūnihi awliyā-a ۖ fallāhu huwal waliyyu wahuwa yuḥyil mawtā wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

ayas.arabic: وَمَا ٱخْتَلَفْتُمْ فِيهِ مِن شَىْءٍ فَحُكْمُهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّى عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَإِلَيْهِ أُنِيبُ
ayas.translation: And in whatsoever ye differ, the verdict therein belongeth to Allah. Such is my Lord, in Whom I put my trust, and unto Whom I turn.
ayas.transliteration: wa makh-talaftum fīhi min shay-in faḥukmuhu ilallāh ۚ dhālikumullāhu rabbī `alayhi tawakkaltu wa ilayhi unīb

ayas.arabic: فَاطِرُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًا وَمِنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ أَزْوَٰجًا ۖ يَذْرَؤُكُمْ فِيهِ ۚ لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِهِۦ شَىْءٌ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْبَصِيرُ
ayas.translation: The Creator of the heavens and the earth. He hath made for you pairs of yourselves, and of the cattle also pairs, whereby He multiplieth you. Naught is as His likeness; and He is the Hearer, the Seer.
ayas.transliteration: fāṭirus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ ja`ala lakum min anfusikum azwājan wa minal-an`āmi azwājā ۖ yadhra-ukum fīh ۚ laysa kamithlihi shay-u ۖ wahuwas samī`ul baṣīr

ayas.arabic: لَهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: His are the keys of the heavens and the earth. He enlargeth providence for whom He will and straiteneth (it for whom He will). Lo! He is Knower of all things.
ayas.transliteration: lahu maqālīdus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ yabsuṭur rizqa liman yashā-u wayaqdir ۚ innahu bikulli shay-in `alīm

ayas.arabic: شَرَعَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلدِّينِ مَا وَصَّىٰ بِهِۦ نُوحًا وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا وَصَّيْنَا بِهِۦٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰٓ ۖ أَنْ أَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَا تَتَفَرَّقُوا۟ فِيهِ ۚ كَبُرَ عَلَى ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مَا تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَيْهِ ۚ ٱللَّهُ يَجْتَبِىٓ إِلَيْهِ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِىٓ إِلَيْهِ مَن يُنِيبُ
ayas.translation: He hath ordained for you that religion which He commended unto Noah, and that which We inspire in thee (Muhammad), and that which We commended unto Abraham and Moses and Jesus, saying: Establish the religion, and be not divided therein. Dreadful for the idolaters is that unto which thou callest them. Allah chooseth for Himself whom He will, and guideth unto Himself him who turneth (toward Him).
ayas.transliteration: shara`a lakum minad dīni mā waṣṣā bihi nūḥan wal ladhī awḥaynā ilayka wa mā waṣṣaynā bihi ibrāhīma wa mūsā wa`īsā ۖ an aqīmud dīna walā tatafarraqū fīh ۚ kabura `alal-mushrikīna mā tad`ūhum ilayh ۚ allāhu yajtabī ilayhi man yashā-u wayahdī ilayhi man yunīb

ayas.arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقُوٓا۟ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْعِلْمُ بَغْيًۢا بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى لَّقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُورِثُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ لَفِى شَكٍّ مِّنْهُ مُرِيبٍ
ayas.translation: And they were not divided until after the knowledge came unto them, through rivalry among themselves; and had it not been for a Word that had already gone forth from thy Lord for an appointed term, it surely had been judged between them. And those who were made to inherit the Scripture after them are verily in hopeless doubt concerning it.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā tafarraqū illā min ba`di mā jā-ahumul `il-mu baghyan baynahum ۚ walawlā kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika ilā ajalin musamman laquḍiya baynahum ۚ wa innal ladhīna ūrithul kitāba min ba`dihim lafī shakkin minhu murīb

ayas.arabic: فَلِذَٰلِكَ فَٱدْعُ ۖ وَٱسْتَقِمْ كَمَآ أُمِرْتَ ۖ وَلَا تَتَّبِعْ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۖ وَقُلْ ءَامَنتُ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن كِتَـٰبٍ ۖ وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَعْدِلَ بَيْنَكُمُ ۖ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّنَا وَرَبُّكُمْ ۖ لَنَآ أَعْمَـٰلُنَا وَلَكُمْ أَعْمَـٰلُكُمْ ۖ لَا حُجَّةَ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكُمُ ۖ ٱللَّهُ يَجْمَعُ بَيْنَنَا ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayas.translation: Unto this, then, summon (O Muhammad). And be thou upright as thou art commanded, and follow not their lusts, but say: I believe in whatever scripture Allah hath sent down, and I am commanded to be just among you. Allah is our Lord and your Lord. Unto us our works and unto you your works; no argument between us and you. Allah will bring us together, and unto Him is the journeying.
ayas.transliteration: falidhālika fad` ۖ wastaqim kamā umirt ۖ walā tattabi` ahwā-ahum ۖ waqul āmantu bimā anzalallāhu min kitāb ۖ wa-umirtu li-a`dila baynakum ۖ allāhu rabbunā warabbukum ۖ lanā a`mālunā walakum a`mālukum ۖ lā ḥujjata baynanā wabaynakum ۖ allāhu yajma`u baynanā ۖ wa ilayhil maṣīr

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآجُّونَ فِى ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ٱسْتُجِيبَ لَهُۥ حُجَّتُهُمْ دَاحِضَةٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ وَعَلَيْهِمْ غَضَبٌ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ
ayas.translation: And those who argue concerning Allah after He hath been acknowledged, their argument hath no weight with their Lord, and wrath is upon them and theirs will be an awful doom.
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna yuḥājjūna fillāhi min ba`di mas-tujība lahu ḥujjatuhum dāḥiḍatun `inda rabbihim wa`alayhim ghaḍabun walahum `adhābun shadīd

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ ۗ وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَرِيبٌ
ayas.translation: Allah it is Who hath revealed the Scripture with truth, and the Balance. How canst thou know? It may be that the Hour is nigh.
ayas.transliteration: allāhul ladhī anzalal-kitāba bil ḥaqqi wal mīzān ۗ wa mā yudrīka la`allas sā`ata qarīb

ayas.arabic: يَسْتَعْجِلُ بِهَا ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهَا ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مُشْفِقُونَ مِنْهَا وَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهَا ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُمَارُونَ فِى ٱلسَّاعَةِ لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
ayas.translation: Those who believe not therein seek to hasten it, while those who believe are fearful of it and know that it is the Truth. Are not they who dispute, in doubt concerning the Hour, far astray?
ayas.transliteration: yasta`jilu bihal ladhīna lā yu-minūna bihā ۖ wal ladhīna āmanū mushfiqūna minhā waya`lamūna annahal ḥaqq ۗ alā innal ladhīna yumārūna fis sā`ati lafī ḍalālin ba`īd

ayas.arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفٌۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْقَوِىُّ ٱلْعَزِيزُ
ayas.translation: Allah is gracious unto His slaves. He provideth for whom He will. And He is the Strong, the Mighty.
ayas.transliteration: allāhu laṭīfun bi`ibādihi yarzuqu man yashā-u ۖ wahuwal qawiyyul `azīz

ayas.arabic: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ حَرْثَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ نَزِدْ لَهُۥ فِى حَرْثِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ حَرْثَ ٱلدُّنْيَا نُؤْتِهِۦ مِنْهَا وَمَا لَهُۥ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ مِن نَّصِيبٍ
ayas.translation: Whoso desireth the harvest of the Hereafter, We give him increase in its harvest. And whoso desireth the harvest of the world, We give him thereof, and he hath no portion in the Hereafter.
ayas.transliteration: man kāna yurīdu ḥarthal-ākhirati nazid lahu fī ḥarthih ۖ wa man kāna yurīdu ḥarthad dunyā nu-tihi minhā wa mā lahu fil-ākhirati min naṣīb

ayas.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَـٰٓؤُا۟ شَرَعُوا۟ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱلدِّينِ مَا لَمْ يَأْذَنۢ بِهِ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةُ ٱلْفَصْلِ لَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: Or have they partners (of Allah) who have made lawful for them in religion that which Allah allowed not? And but for a decisive word (gone forth already), it would have been judged between them. Lo! for wrong-doers is a painful doom.
ayas.transliteration: am lahum shurakā-u shara`ū lahum minad dīni mā lam ya-dhan bihillāh ۚ walawlā kalimatul faṣli laquḍiya baynahum ۗ wa innaẓ ẓālimīna lahum `adhābun alīm

ayas.arabic: تَرَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مُشْفِقِينَ مِمَّا كَسَبُوا۟ وَهُوَ وَاقِعٌۢ بِهِمْ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فِى رَوْضَاتِ ٱلْجَنَّاتِ ۖ لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
ayas.translation: Thou seest the wrong-doers fearful of that which they have earned, and it will surely befall them, while those who believe and do good works (will be) in flowering meadows of the Gardens, having what they wish from their Lord. This is the great preferment.
ayas.transliteration: taraẓ ẓālimīna mushfiqīna mimmā kasabū wahuwa wāqi`un bihim ۗ wal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti fī rawḍātil jannāt ۖ lahum mā yashā-ūna `inda rabbihim ۚ dhālika huwal faḍlul kabīr

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يُبَشِّرُ ٱللَّهُ عِبَادَهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ ۗ قُل لَّآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ أَجْرًا إِلَّا ٱلْمَوَدَّةَ فِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ ۗ وَمَن يَقْتَرِفْ حَسَنَةً نَّزِدْ لَهُۥ فِيهَا حُسْنًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
ayas.translation: This it is which Allah announceth unto His bondmen who believe and do good works. Say (O Muhammad, unto mankind): I ask of you no fee therefor, save lovingkindness among kinsfolk. And whoso scoreth a good deed We add unto its good for him. Lo! Allah is Forgiving, Responsive.
ayas.transliteration: dhālikal ladhī yubashhirullāhu `ibādahul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāt ۗ qul lā as-alukum `alayhi ajran illal-mawaddata fil qurbā ۗ wa man yaqtarif ḥasanatan nazid lahu fīhā ḥusnā ۚ innallāha ghafūrun shakūr

ayas.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا ۖ فَإِن يَشَإِ ٱللَّهُ يَخْتِمْ عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ ۗ وَيَمْحُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْبَـٰطِلَ وَيُحِقُّ ٱلْحَقَّ بِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayas.translation: Or say they: He hath invented a lie concerning Allah? If Allah willed, He could have sealed thy heart (against them). And Allah will wipe out the lie and will vindicate the truth by His words. Lo! He is Aware of what is hidden in the breasts (of men).
ayas.transliteration: am yaqūlūnaf-tarā `alallāhi kadhibā ۖ fa-in yasha-illāhu yakhtim `alā qalbik ۗ wayamḥullāhul bāṭila wayuḥiqqul ḥaqqa bikalimātih ۚ innahu `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يَقْبَلُ ٱلتَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَعْفُوا۟ عَنِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
ayas.translation: And He it is Who accepteth repentance from His bondmen, and pardoneth the evil deeds, and knoweth what ye do,
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī yaqbalut tawbata `an `ibādihi waya`fū `anis sayyi-āti waya`lamu mā taf`alūn

ayas.arabic: وَيَسْتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَيَزِيدُهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ
ayas.translation: And accepteth those who do good works, and giveth increase unto them of His bounty. And as for disbelievers, theirs will be an awful doom.
ayas.transliteration: wayastajībul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti wayazīduhum min faḍlih ۚ wal kāfirūna lahum `adhābun shadīd

ayas.arabic: وَلَوْ بَسَطَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِعِبَادِهِۦ لَبَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَـٰكِن يُنَزِّلُ بِقَدَرٍ مَّا يَشَآءُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرٌۢ بَصِيرٌ
ayas.translation: And if Allah were to enlarge the provision for His slaves they would surely rebel in the earth, but He sendeth down by measure as He willeth. Lo! He is Informed, a Seer of His bondmen.
ayas.transliteration: walaw basaṭallāhur rizqa li`ibādihi labaghaw fil-arḍi walākin yunazzilu biqadarin mā yashā-u ۚ innahu bi`ibādihi khabīrun baṣīr

ayas.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُنَزِّلُ ٱلْغَيْثَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا قَنَطُوا۟ وَيَنشُرُ رَحْمَتَهُۥ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْوَلِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
ayas.translation: And He it is Who sendeth down the saving rain after they have despaired, and spreadeth out His mercy. He is the Protecting Friend, the Praiseworthy.
ayas.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī yunazzilul ghaytha min ba`di mā qanaṭū wayanshuru raḥmatah ۚ wahuwal waliyyul ḥamīd

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ خَلْقُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَثَّ فِيهِمَا مِن دَآبَّةٍ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ جَمْعِهِمْ إِذَا يَشَآءُ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: And of His portents is the creation of the heaven and the earth, and of whatever beasts He hath dispersed therein. And He is Able to gather them when He will.
ayas.transliteration: wa min āyātihi khalqus samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bathha fīhimā min dābbah ۚ wahuwa `alā jam`ihim idhā yashā-u qadīr

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَصَـٰبَكُم مِّن مُّصِيبَةٍ فَبِمَا كَسَبَتْ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَيَعْفُوا۟ عَن كَثِيرٍ
ayas.translation: Whatever of misfortune striketh you, it is what your right hands have earned. And He forgiveth much.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā aṣābakum min muṣībatin fabimā kasabat aydīkum waya`fū `an kathīr

ayas.arabic: وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِىٍّ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
ayas.translation: Ye cannot escape in the earth, for beside Allah ye have no protecting friend nor any helper.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā antum bimu`jizīna fil-arḍ ۖ wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi min waliyyin walā naṣīr

ayas.arabic: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِ ٱلْجَوَارِ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ
ayas.translation: And of His portents are the ships, like banners on the sea;
ayas.transliteration: wa min āyātihil jawāri fil baḥri kal-a`lām

ayas.arabic: إِن يَشَأْ يُسْكِنِ ٱلرِّيحَ فَيَظْلَلْنَ رَوَاكِدَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٍ شَكُورٍ
ayas.translation: If He will He calmeth the wind so that they keep still upon its surface - Lo! herein verily are signs for every steadfast grateful (heart). -
ayas.transliteration: in yasha-yuskinir rīḥa fayaẓlalna rawākida `alā ẓahrih ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūr

ayas.arabic: أَوْ يُوبِقْهُنَّ بِمَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَيَعْفُ عَن كَثِيرٍ
ayas.translation: Or He causeth them to perish on account of that which they have earned - And He forgiveth much -
ayas.transliteration: aw yūbiqhunna bimā kasabū waya`fu `an kathīr

ayas.arabic: وَيَعْلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَـٰدِلُونَ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٍ
ayas.translation: And that those who argue concerning Our revelations may know they have no refuge.
ayas.transliteration: waya`lamal ladhīna yujādilūna fī āyātinā mā lahum min maḥīṣ

ayas.arabic: فَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّن شَىْءٍ فَمَتَـٰعُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
ayas.translation: Now whatever ye have been given is but a passing comfort for the life of the world, and that which Allah hath is better and more lasting for those who believe and put their trust in their Lord,
ayas.transliteration: famā ūtītum min shay-in famatā`ul ḥayātid dunyā ۖ wa mā `indallāhi khayrun wa-abqā lilladhīna āmanū wa`alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰٓئِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ وَإِذَا مَا غَضِبُوا۟ هُمْ يَغْفِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And those who shun the worst of sins and indecencies and, when they are wroth, forgive,
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna yajtanibūna kabā-iral-ithmi wal fawāḥisha wa idhā mā ghaḍibū hum yaghfirūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَجَابُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَمْرُهُمْ شُورَىٰ بَيْنَهُمْ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
ayas.translation: And those who answer the call of their Lord and establish worship, and whose affairs are a matter of counsel, and who spend of what We have bestowed on them,
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīnas-tajābū lirabbihim wa-aqāmuṣ ṣalāta wa-amruhum shūrā baynahum wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn

ayas.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلْبَغْىُ هُمْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
ayas.translation: And those who, when great wrong is done to them, defend themselves,
ayas.transliteration: wal ladhīna idhā aṣābahumul baghyu hum yantaṣirūn

ayas.arabic: وَجَزَٰٓؤُا۟ سَيِّئَةٍ سَيِّئَةٌ مِّثْلُهَا ۖ فَمَنْ عَفَا وَأَصْلَحَ فَأَجْرُهُۥ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayas.translation: The guerdon of an ill-deed is an ill the like thereof. But whosoever pardoneth and amendeth, his wage is the affair of Allah. Lo! He loveth not wrong-doers.
ayas.transliteration: wajazā-u sayyi-atin sayyi-atun mithluhā ۖ faman `afā wa-aṣlaḥa fa-ajruhu `alallāh ۚ innahu lā yuḥibbuẓ ẓālimīn

ayas.arabic: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعْدَ ظُلْمِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيْهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ
ayas.translation: And whoso defendeth himself after he hath suffered wrong - for such, there is no way (of blame) against them.
ayas.transliteration: walamanin-taṣara ba`da ẓul-mihi fa-ulā-ika mā `alayhim min sabīl

ayas.arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلسَّبِيلُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَظْلِمُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ وَيَبْغُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
ayas.translation: The way (of blame) is only against those who oppress mankind, and wrongfully rebel in the earth. For such there is a painful doom.
ayas.transliteration: innamas sabīlu `alal ladhīna yaẓlimūnan nāsa wayabghūna fil-arḍi bighayril ḥaqq ۚ ulā-ika lahum `adhābun alīm

ayas.arabic: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنْ عَزْمِ ٱلْأُمُورِ
ayas.translation: And verily whoso is patient and forgiveth - lo! that, verily, is (of) the steadfast heart of things.
ayas.transliteration: walaman ṣabara waghafara inna dhālika lamin `azmil-umūr

ayas.arabic: وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن وَلِىٍّ مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ ۗ وَتَرَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ لَمَّا رَأَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ يَقُولُونَ هَلْ إِلَىٰ مَرَدٍّ مِّن سَبِيلٍ
ayas.translation: He whom Allah sendeth astray, for him there is no protecting friend after Him. And thou (Muhammad) wilt see the evil-doers when they see the doom, (how) they say: Is there any way of return?
ayas.transliteration: wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min waliyyin min ba`dih ۗ wataraẓ ẓālimīna lammā ra-awul `adhāba yaqūlūna hal ilā maraddin min sabīl

ayas.arabic: وَتَرَىٰهُمْ يُعْرَضُونَ عَلَيْهَا خَـٰشِعِينَ مِنَ ٱلذُّلِّ يَنظُرُونَ مِن طَرْفٍ خَفِىٍّ ۗ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ فِى عَذَابٍ مُّقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And thou wilt see them exposed to (the Fire), made humble by disgrace, and looking with veiled eyes. And those who believe will say: Lo! the (eternal) losers are they who lose themselves and their housefolk on the Day of Resurrection. Lo! are not the wrong-doers in perpetual torment?
ayas.transliteration: watarāhum yu`raḍūna `alayhā khāshi`īna minadh dhulli yanẓurūna min ṭarfin khafiyy ۗ waqālal ladhīna āmanū innal khāsirīnal ladhīna khasirū anfusahum wa-ahlīhim yawmal qiyāmah ۗ alā innaẓ ẓālimīna fī `adhābin muqīm

ayas.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ يَنصُرُونَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن سَبِيلٍ
ayas.translation: And they will have no protecting friends to help them instead of Allah. He whom Allah sendeth astray, for him there is no road.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā kāna lahum min awliyā-a yanṣurūnahum min dūnillāh ۗ wa man yuḍlilillāhu famā lahu min sabīl

ayas.arabic: ٱسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لِرَبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِىَ يَوْمٌ لَّا مَرَدَّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ مَا لَكُم مِّن مَّلْجَإٍ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّكِيرٍ
ayas.translation: Answer the call of your Lord before there cometh unto you from Allah a Day which there is no averting. Ye have no refuge on that Day, nor have a ye any (power of) refusal.
ayas.transliteration: is-tajībū lirabbikum min qabli an ya-tiya yawmul lā maradda lahu minallāh ۚ mā lakum min malja-in yawma-idhin wa mā lakum min nakīr

ayas.arabic: فَإِنْ أَعْرَضُوا۟ فَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَفِيظًا ۖ إِنْ عَلَيْكَ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ۗ وَإِنَّآ إِذَآ أَذَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِنَّا رَحْمَةً فَرِحَ بِهَا ۖ وَإِن تُصِبْهُمْ سَيِّئَةٌۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ فَإِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ كَفُورٌ
ayas.translation: But if they are averse, We have not sent thee as a warder over them. Thine is only to convey (the message). And lo! when We cause man to taste of mercy from Us he exulteth therefor. And if some evil striketh them because of that which their own hands have sent before, then lo! man is an ingrate.
ayas.transliteration: fa-in a`raḍū famā arsalnāka `alayhim ḥafīẓā ۖ in `alayka illal-balāgh ۗ wa innā idhā adhaqnal-insāna minnā raḥmatan fariḥa bihā ۖ wa in tuṣibhum sayyi-atun bimā qaddamat aydīhim fa-innal-insāna kafūr

ayas.arabic: لِّلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ يَهَبُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ إِنَـٰثًا وَيَهَبُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ ٱلذُّكُورَ
ayas.translation: Unto Allah belongeth the Sovereignty of the heavens and the earth. He createth what He will. He bestoweth female (offspring) upon whom He will, and bestoweth male (offspring) upon whom He will;
ayas.transliteration: lillāhi mulkus samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ yakhluqu mā yashā-u ۚ yahabu liman yashā-u ināthan wayahabu liman yashā-udh dhukūr

ayas.arabic: أَوْ يُزَوِّجُهُمْ ذُكْرَانًا وَإِنَـٰثًا ۖ وَيَجْعَلُ مَن يَشَآءُ عَقِيمًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Or He mingleth them, males and females, and He maketh barren whom He will. Lo! He is Knower, Powerful.
ayas.transliteration: aw yuzawwijuhum dhukrānan wa ināthā ۖ wayaj`alu man yashā-u `aqīmā ۚ innahu `alīmun qadīr

ayas.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لِبَشَرٍ أَن يُكَلِّمَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا وَحْيًا أَوْ مِن وَرَآئِ حِجَابٍ أَوْ يُرْسِلَ رَسُولًا فَيُوحِىَ بِإِذْنِهِۦ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِىٌّ حَكِيمٌ
ayas.translation: And it was not (vouchsafed) to any mortal that Allah should speak to him unless (it be) by revelation or from behind a veil, or (that) He sendeth a messenger to reveal what He will by His leave. Lo! He is Exalted, Wise.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā kāna libasharin an yukallimahullāhu illā waḥyan aw min warā-i ḥijābin aw yursila rasūlan fayūḥiya bi-idhnihi mā yashā-u ۚ innahu `aliyyun ḥakīm

ayas.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ رُوحًا مِّنْ أَمْرِنَا ۚ مَا كُنتَ تَدْرِى مَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ وَلَا ٱلْإِيمَـٰنُ وَلَـٰكِن جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُورًا نَّهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن نَّشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَتَهْدِىٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: And thus have We inspired in thee (Muhammad) a Spirit of Our command. Thou knewest not what the Scripture was, nor what the Faith. But We have made it a light whereby We guide whom We will of Our bondmen. And lo! thou verily dost guide unto a right path,
ayas.transliteration: wakadhālika awḥaynā ilayka rūḥan min amrinā ۚ mā kunta tadrī mal kitābu walal-iymānu walākin ja`alnāhu nūran nahdī bihi man nashā-u min `ibādinā ۚ wa innaka latahdī ilā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: صِرَٰطِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَلَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَصِيرُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
ayas.translation: The path of Allah, unto Whom belongeth whatsoever is in the heavens and whatsoever is in the earth. Do not all things reach Allah at last?
ayas.transliteration: ṣirāṭillāhil ladhī lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۗ alā ilallāhi taṣīrul-umūr
